enhanced_by.reason: The split method relies on the worstCombination method to determine the initial groups, making it a critical setup step.
The assignRemaining method is used to distribute remaining items into the two groups, closely related to the split method's core functionality.
The getBestCandidateForGroup method is used within assignRemaining to determine the best item to add to a group, which can inform assertions about the split method's group assignments.
The Util.mbr method is used to calculate the minimum bounding rectangle for a group, which can be used to assert the correctness of the split method's group MBRs.
